**Subject:** Secretary_Helen

**Commentary:** Anyone that has visited SkipIRC at least once knows about Helen. Helen is a bot with a plenitude of functions. One of her functions is represented on this coat of arms. The wall is a symbol for her ban wall that keeps all banned users out of SkipIRC. The red shapes represent these banned users trying to overcome the wall. But on the other side all is calm and Helen watches peacefully. Oh, did I already mention that Helen is a revolver? Yeah, Helen is a revolver.

**How the prompt fits in:** This was a rather difficult prompt to realise. Although I knew what I wanted to portray, I found it hard to actually portray the concept of Pressure. In the end, I chose the rather abstract solution that you see here.
